tweets.content: "No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin or his background or his religion..."

Kobe was a legend on the court and just getting started in what would have been just as meaningful a second act. To lose Gianna is even more heartbreaking to us as parents. Michelle and I send love and prayers to Vanessa and the entire Bryant family on an unthinkable day.

combined_text: "No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin or his background or his religion..." Kobe was a legend on the court and just getting started in what would have been just as meaningful a second act. To lose Gianna is even more heartbreaking to us as parents. Michelle and I send love and prayers to Vanessa and the entire Bryant family on an unthinkable day. Congratulations to my friend, President JoeBiden ! This is your time. In every scene, you are my star, MichelleObama ! Happy birthday, baby! Thirty-two years together and you still take my breath away. Happy Valentine’s Day, MichelleObama !
summary: Gianna Bryant's death makes me sad but also gives me hope that we will continue to fight for justice and equality no matter what happens. Thank you so much for everything.
